channel.title: How does one record to circular buffer
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I'm new to axoloti, coming from max, I would appreciate any help.
I'm trying to create a circular buffer: record live audio into a table and once it reaches the end keep recording at the beginning of the table.
I then would like to read from the table from the current position and play back a variable size, similar to sss's repeater or sptnk's slicer. I thought that connecting an lfo to position inlets of both would be all i needed to do but it seems more complicated than that?
Apologies for my ignorance.
Thanks
